text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump Are you kidding us?? He annouced that the coronavirus vaccine may not be affordable to everyone only to a his rich friends. Look what he did to California only 2 testing labs in the state which he has never supported CA. Trump only cares about Trump not anyone else.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
